   19: %%
   20: -module(win32reg_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   23: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,long/1,evil_write/1,
   24:          read_write_default_1/1,read_write_default_2/1,
   25:          delete_key/1, up_and_away/1]).
   26: 
   27: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   28: 
   29: suite() ->
   30:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   31:      {timetrap,{seconds,10}}].
   32: 
   33: all() -> 
   34:     [long,
   35:      evil_write,
   36:      read_write_default_1,
   37:      read_write_default_2,
   38:      delete_key,
   39:      up_and_away].
   40: 
   41: groups() -> 
   42:     [].
   43: 
   44: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   45:     Config.
   46: 
   47: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   48:     Config.
   49: 
   50: 
   51: init_per_suite(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   52:     case os:type() of
   53: 	{win32, _} ->
   54: 	    Config;
   55: 	_ ->
   56: 	    {skip,"Doesn't run on UNIX."}
   57:     end.
   58: end_per_suite(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   59:     Config.
   60: 
   61: %% Test long keys and entries (OTP-3446).
   62: long(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   63:     LongKey = "software\\" ++
   64: 	lists:flatten(lists:duplicate(10, "..\\software\\")) ++
   65: 	"Ericsson\\Erlang",
   66:     {ok,Read} = win32reg:open([read]),
   67:     ok = win32reg:change_key(Read, "\\hklm"),
   68: 
   69:     case os:getenv("WSLENV") of
   70:         false ->
   71:             ok = win32reg:change_key(Read, LongKey),
   72:             {ok,ErlangKey} = win32reg:current_key(Read),
   73:             io:format("Erlang key: ~s~n", [ErlangKey]),
   74:             ok = win32reg:close(Read),
   75: 
   76:             {ok,Reg} = win32reg:open([read, write]),
   77:             %% Write a long value and read it back.
   78:             TestKey = "test_key",
   79:             LongValue = lists:concat(["This is a long value generated by the test case ",?MODULE,":long/1. "|lists:duplicate(128, "a")]),
   80:             ok = win32reg:set_value(Reg, TestKey, LongValue),
   81:             {ok,LongValue} = win32reg:value(Reg, TestKey),
   82: 
   83:             io:format("Where ~p Key ~s Value ~s ~n", [win32reg:current_key(Reg), TestKey, LongValue]),
   84:             %% Done.
   85:             ok = win32reg:close(Reg);
   86:         _ ->
   87:             %% We have installed erlang when testing on win10 and newer
   88:             ok
   89:     end.
   90: 
   91: evil_write(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   92:     Key = "Software\\Ericsson\\Erlang",
   93:     {ok,Reg} = win32reg:open([read,write]),
   94:     ok = win32reg:change_key(Reg, "\\hkcu"),
   95:     ok = win32reg:change_key_create(Reg, Key),
   96:     {ok,ErlangKey} = win32reg:current_key(Reg),
   97:     io:format("Erlang key: ~s", [ErlangKey]),
   98: 
   99:     %% Write keys with different length and read it back.
  100:     TestKey = "test_key " ++ lists:duplicate(128, $a),
  101:     evil_write_1(Reg, TestKey),
  102: 
  103:     %% Done.
  104:     ok = win32reg:close(Reg),
  105:     ok.
  106: 
  107: evil_write_1(Reg, [_|[_|_]=Key]=Key0) ->
  108:     io:format("Key = ~p\n", [Key0]),
  109:     ok = win32reg:set_value(Reg, Key0, "A good value for me"),
  110:     {ok,_Val} = win32reg:value(Reg, Key0),
  111:     ok = win32reg:delete_value(Reg, Key0),
  112:     evil_write_1(Reg, Key);
  113: evil_write_1(_, [_]) -> ok.
  114: 
  115: read_write_default_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  116:     Key = "Software\\Ericsson\\Erlang",
  117:     Value = "The default value 1",
  118:     {ok,Reg} = win32reg:open([read,write]),
  119:     ok = win32reg:change_key(Reg, "\\hkcu"),
  120:     ok = win32reg:change_key_create(Reg, Key),
  121:     ok = win32reg:set_value(Reg, default, Value),
  122:     {ok,Value} = win32reg:value(Reg, default),
  123:     ok = win32reg:delete_value(Reg, default),
  124:     {error,enoent} = win32reg:value(Reg, default),
  125:     ok = win32reg:close(Reg),
  126:     ok.
  127: 
  128: read_write_default_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  129:     Key = "Software\\Ericsson\\Erlang",
  130:     Value = "The default value 2",
  131:     {ok,Reg} = win32reg:open([read,write]),
  132:     ok = win32reg:change_key(Reg, "\\hkcu"),
  133:     ok = win32reg:change_key_create(Reg, Key),
  134:     ok = win32reg:set_value(Reg, "", Value),
  135:     {ok,Value} = win32reg:value(Reg, ""),
  136:     ok = win32reg:delete_value(Reg, ""),
  137:     {error,enoent} = win32reg:value(Reg, ""),
  138:     ok = win32reg:close(Reg),
  139:     ok.
  140: 
  141: delete_key(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  142:     Key = "Software\\Ericsson\\Erlang\\new-test-key",
  143:     {ok,Reg} = win32reg:open([read,write]),
  144:     ok = win32reg:change_key(Reg, "\\hkcu"),
  145:     ok = win32reg:change_key_create(Reg, Key),
  146:     {ok, []} = win32reg:sub_keys(Reg),
  147:     ok = win32reg:delete_key(Reg),
  148:     ok = win32reg:close(Reg),
  149:     ok.
  150: 
  151: up_and_away(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  152:     {ok,Reg} = win32reg:open([read]),
  153:     {ok, "\\hkey_classes_root"} = win32reg:current_key(Reg),
  154:     {error,enoent} = win32reg:change_key(Reg, ".."),
  155:     ok = win32reg:close(Reg),
  156:     ok.
